titleStmt.title: A true discourse of the discomfiture of the Duke of Aumalle, vvith his troupes of horsmen in Picardie, by the Duke of Longueville Also other troupes of men discomfited in Beausse, by the Lord of Chastillon: together with the king of Nauarre his letters to the inhabitants of Orleans.

A true discourse of the discomfiture of the Duke of Aumalle, vvith his troupes of horsmen in Picardie, by the Duke of Longueville Also other troupes of men discomfited in Beausse, by the Lord of Chastillon: together with the king of Nauarre his letters to the inhabitants of Orleans.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field, according to the French copies first printed at Tours,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
